Pluie à deux

BACK AT IT AGAIN?! it’s me and Amadeus’s second ren’py game, a micro kinetic novel (no choices) that can be played IN BROWSER!

CHECK IT OUT ON ITCH.IO!

our genius thought processes:

(STORY SPOILERS BELOW)

  • me: i'm not gonna draw jigen's jacket cus it would look like crap from the side
  • amadeus: it's raining and he gave his jacket to fujiko
  • us: GALAXYBRAIN
  • (decided from the start that the camera will be watching jigen from the side)
  • amadeus: "There’s nothing unkind about the way he looks at me."
  • me: that's why he's facing away all game WEHHHHHHHH
  • us: GALAXYBRAIN
